phrases: Doctor!
Doctor Koike!
How are you feeling?
Ayumi...
Where is she?
I am terribly sorry, but she passed away...
I am Detective Someda.
I am terribly sorry for your loss...
We are trying to figure out what truly happened.
I heard that you were at the scene...
Are you all right?
I am sure it is rough on you being so sudden.
But for her sake, you have to keep looking forward, okay?
Time can heal many wounds in this world.
Though it will not heal everything.
Hey...
did I...
do even one thing for her...
Was I able...
to repay her?
Not yet...
I did not repay her at all.
To think she would be gone so fast...
I did not even think about it.
Even if I wanted to repay...
I cannot repay her anymore...
Episode 7 The End of the Exodus
Was there... anything left?
Otosaka house - Secret Pizza Sauce
Otosaka!
Otosaka, if you have not eaten yet, would you like to eat together?
Here, see, I made some cream stew!
It is Yusarin's special cream stew, you know?
I do not want any.
Well... what should we do?
Let us look again.
Unfortunately, he is already gone back.
Something always worth eating!
Yusarin's special cream stew is...
Such a turn-off!
I will make Yusa make as much as you want!
So use your power to break this door!
I can break fortified glass, but this door is impossible!
Due to security reasons,
it is made a lot sturdier than normal condos!
You are so useless...
Even if I burn this, nothing comes of it...
My usual sense does not shine through at all!
And I thought I knew the pain of losing
a sister more than the average person...
Well... what happened in the end?
It seems we need a bit more time.
Indeed.
Then, let us come back again later.
Excuse me, I am going to just barge in without permission.
Um, it is me, Shirayanagi.
Well...
Was he all right?
Yes!
I think he is all right!
Then, I am leaving you with the rest!
Who is it...
It is me, Shirayanagi, the one you saved the life of in the past.
So?
I heard that you have not been to school ever since...
About your little sister...
I am terribly sorry.
I am in no position to be able to say this, but is there anything I can do
Nothing.
Anything is fine.
Otosaka, I want to be of help to you!
Help to me?
There is no need for that.
I am totally fine.
There is no way that is true.
I mean, you have only been eating cup-o-noodles, right?
I like them, so it is fine.
Well then... those pancakes we ate together.
How about we go eat that again?
Pancakes?
When did we eat that?
The day you saved my life.
Cup-o-noodles and pancakes...
are not they about the same nutrition-wise?
That may be true... but...
in any case, we should head outside?
Oh yeah.
I am so glad...
Then, can I ask you to go buy cases of cup-o-noodles?
You are going to run an errand for me, right?
Cup-o-noodles.
I do not care what kind.
No, no...
Otosaka, you are coming with me!
I am not going to go.
I will pay you back later.
I will not go unless you are coming with me!
You will not go unless I am coming with you?
Shirayanagi, was it?
Are you... my legal guardian?
No, I do not mean it like that at all!
But, in my own way, I think about you
- You are not here to run errands for me?
Right now, Otosaka, it is important for you to step outside!
If you stay cooped up, your get more and more ill mentally...
Mentally ill?
Yes.
That is why I have been telling you.
I am totally fine.
People who are fine do not live like this!
It is proof that you are mentally ill!
Do not go off and treat people like they are sick!!
If you will not run errands, can you go home?
Fine...
I am sorry for doing something unnecessary.
I have to go stock up again...
I guess they are here to capture me by force...
Shirayanagi may have been acting because she was asked to.
Which means, this may be the timing for my exit.
I will be going out for a while.
With this much, I am sure I can live for a while without going back home...
Withdrawal Fee Balance Left
So that the soaking wet guy cannot find me,
I need to escape to somewhere far away...
I think I have come pretty far now...
Internet and Comic Cafe
I have gotten sick of noodles, so I guess I will have some pizza.
Surprisingly enough, I can be hard to find...
Excuse me.
Your pizza... and a salad.
Salad?
A free item, huh.
I do not want it.
So damn boring.
How many days has it been?
Nothing has gone on for this long.
I am sure they will not find me.
I guess I will go out for just a little bit...
Fried Mitarashi Dango
Can I have that?
Sure thing!
So good...
it is been a while since I last ate something sweet.
I did not know there was such a game...
This is fun!
Die!
Die!
I will kill you all!
Die!
Die!
How long do you think you are playing?
What?
You picking a fight?
What is up?
This guy hit me with trash, telling me to get outta the way.
And who do you think you are?
Just a normal law-abiding citizen, you know?
A normal law-abiding citizen hits people with trash?
Of course, if they get pissed off.
Do not mock us!
Pull him outside.
You are the one that picked a fight with us, you know?
I guess you have to see a bit of pain.
Can you win against me?
Bring it.
I will make sure you cannot play games for a while.
You bastard, what do you think you are doing?
I am pretty sure that I punched this guy!
What, you guys are falling out already?
You guys okay?
What is this...
What the hell is going on
There is one more!
It is merely the fact that I am strong.
Next time you go against me, I will literally kill you.
Got that?
Yo.
You the bastard that knocked out all of Gondo's guys by yourself?
Gondo?
Maybe a guy by that name was in that bunch.
I am Hosoyamada.
Remember that.
That is a name that I am probably going to forget in a few minutes.
You got some nerve.
You think so little of us...
Hey guys, teach him a lesson.
What the hell are you bastards doing?
I-It is not me!
Can I crush one eye?
You can get a self-conscious nickname like One-Eyed Hososomething you know?
Why are you undecided?
One-Eyed sounds cool, right?
Here goes!
Dammit!
I lose!
THE Hosoyamada...
Impossible!
Nobody can win against me!
Real life is more fun than a game!
What is this?
Is it something important?
So that is how it is.
Wait... you... when did you
The whole time.
The whole time?
It cannot be...
If you proceed any further, you will not be able
to return to being a human ever again.
That is why I stopped you.
Did someone send you?
No, I have submitted a leave of absence request to the school.
I am here privately.
For what?
I feel responsible for this, too...
The decision I made back then was not appropriate.
Maybe I should have immediately quarantined Ayumi to a safe location.
That is why I decided that I will stick it out with you,
until you have risen back up to normal.
That is none of your business!
You took my valuable prey
Do you want to be crippled for life?
Do you want to stop being human?
Then... what are you saying I should do?
For starters, how about you have a decent meal?
A good meal may be the foundation for energy.
I am eating properly.
Can you say a diet of just pizza
and sweet soy sauce mochi skewers is decent?
I am sure it will calm you down.
What are you saying I should eat?
Leave it to me.
I will get it right away.
Oh, excuse me.
Right.
Thank you.
Why are you setting it all up without my permission!
Just one bite.
After that, I swear that we
will not have anything to do with each other ever again.
One bite?
Really just one bite?
Yes, I promise.
Fine.
Then, let us go.
That promise is absolute.
Right.
Takajo
Takajo?
Yes.
His family home.
Is not someone here?
Nobody is here, so rest assured.
Please watch some TV or something.
What are you going to make me eat?
That is a surprise for you to see when it is done.
- Here, it is done.
- Here, it is done.
Secret
Here you go.
It is the same taste...
That makes me glad.
How...
Your mother left behind a notebook of recipes.
I took the liberty of borrowing it.
The page with the omelet rice was the
only one with a big flowery circle on it.
Secret Sauce - Have a good day Yu
Most likely, it was your favorite food in the past.
Ayumi, after your mother was no longer around, saw that,
and was probably recreating that taste for all this time.
A good thing
So that was... the last omelet rice...
Dammit... it is sweet, and tastes horrible...
but what is this?
It is not healthy for you to scarf down food.
Please eat slowly.
Yeah...
Here, have some tea.
And take this, too.
Hey, Tomori...
Yes.
What should I do from here on..?
How about you return to the student council once again?
But you and I...
We promised we would never have anything to do with each other again.
What are you talking about?
After I ate this... you said that is what would happen.
You did not eat just one bite.
You ate it all.
I watched, thinking, Wow, you really want to have something to do with me.
Nothing less from you...
Fine.
I will go back to the student council.
I am glad.
